title: Gallery Talk: The Arranged Flower: Ikebana and Flora in Japanese Prints
hero_caption: <p>Kitagawa Utamaro.&nbsp;<em>The Ninth Month</em>, from the series "Five Amorous Festivals of Love (Aibore iro no gosekku)," 1801. Clarence Buckingh …
description:
The time-honored artistic discipline of floral arrangement embodies Japan's profound interest in the natural world. Lucas Livingston leads a discussion of Japanese woodblock prints boldly capturing and exploring the art of ikebana.
